# action

**Instance Property**

The ownership behavior for the records.

## Declaration

```swift
var action: CKRecord.ReferenceAction { get }
```

## Discussion

The value in this property determines which action, if any, to take when deleting the target of the reference object — that is, the object that the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKRecord/Reference/recordID] property points to. When this property is [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKRecord/ReferenceAction/deleteSelf], deleting the target object deletes any records that contain that reference in one of their fields. When this property is [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKRecord/ReferenceAction/none], deleting the target object doesn’t delete any additional objects.

## Getting the Reference Attributes

- **recordID**: The ID of the referenced record.
- **CKRecord.ReferenceAction**: Constants that indicate the behavior when deleting a referenced record.
